named-native-query.name: Stock.allStockArticle
named-native-query.query: SELECT geo_stock.art_ref as art_ref, geo_stock.age as age, avi_art_cdc.esp_code as esp_code, avi_art_mat_prem.var_code as var_code, geo_article.caf_code as caf_code, avi_art_normalisation.cam_code as cam_code, avi_art_cdc.cat_code as cat_code, avi_art_emballage.col_code as col_code, avi_art_mat_prem.ori_code as ori_code, geo_stock.STO_REF as sto_ref, geo_stock.fou_code as fou_code, geo_stock.PROP_CODE as prop_code, geo_stock.STO_DESC as sto_desc, geo_stock.DATE_FAB as date_fab, geo_stock.STO_STATUT as sto_statut, geo_stock.DATE_STATUT as date_statut, geo_stock.PAL_CODE as pal_code FROM geo_stock, geo_article, geo_fourni, avi_art_gestion, avi_art_mat_prem, avi_art_cdc, avi_art_emballage, avi_art_normalisation WHERE (avi_art_gestion.art_ref = geo_stock.art_ref) AND geo_fourni.fou_code (+) = geo_stock.fou_code AND geo_stock.art_ref (+) = geo_article.art_ref AND avi_art_mat_prem.ref_mat_prem (+) = avi_art_gestion.ref_mat_prem AND avi_art_cdc.ref_cdc (+) = avi_art_gestion.ref_cdc AND avi_art_emballage.ref_emballage (+) = avi_art_gestion.ref_emballage AND avi_art_normalisation.ref_normalisation (+) = avi_art_gestion.ref_normalisation AND geo_stock.STO_REF_FROM IS NULL AND avi_art_cdc.esp_code LIKE :arg_espece AND avi_art_mat_prem.var_code LIKE :arg_variete AND avi_art_mat_prem.ori_code LIKE :arg_origine AND avi_art_mat_prem.mode_culture LIKE :arg_mode_culture AND avi_art_emballage.col_code LIKE :arg_emballage AND geo_fourni.bac_code LIKE :arg_bureau_achat GROUP BY geo_stock.art_ref, geo_stock.age, avi_art_cdc.esp_code, avi_art_mat_prem.var_code, geo_article.caf_code, avi_art_normalisation.cam_code, avi_art_cdc.cat_code, avi_art_emballage.col_code, avi_art_mat_prem.ori_code, geo_stock.STO_REF, geo_stock.fou_code, geo_stock.PROP_CODE, geo_stock.STO_DESC, geo_stock.DATE_FAB, geo_stock.STO_STATUT, geo_stock.DATE_STATUT, geo_stock.PAL_CODE
